description:
Prepare to geek out, Arrow fans.准备惊呼吧，《绿箭》的粉丝们。

Multiple sources confirm that Summer Glau has sign on to recur on Arrow Season 2. She will come on board as Isabel Rochev, Vice President of Acquisitions of Stellmoor International, an organization looking to take over Queen Consolidated.众多消息证实，莎莫•格劳（Summer Glau）已同《绿箭》第二季签订循环角色的合同，饰演伊莎贝尔•罗切夫（Isabel Rochev）——斯特尔摩国际收购的副总裁。而该企业想要吞并奎恩集团。

The character is referred to as "The Queen" in the comic book series and - QUASI SPOILER ALERT! - she ends up taking over as CEO of Queen Industries after the death of Oliver's father. She also has a major beef with Oliver and Moira. Again, in the comic at least.在漫画中，该角色即为“女王”——准剧透慎读——她在奥利弗（Oliver）的父亲死后接管了奎恩工业，担任CEO。她还同奥利弗和莫伊拉（Moira）矛盾重重。至少漫画中是这样。

On the show side, Isabel's name appeared in Robert's book during a quick scene on Season 1.而在第一季剧中一个快速镜头里，伊莎贝尔的名字出现在罗伯特（Robert）的本子上。

Among other roles, Glau has appeared on Firefly, Dollhouse and Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles.格劳还在《萤火虫》、《玩偶特工》以及《终结者外传》中饰演过其他角色。

Arrow Season 2, meanwhile, premieres on Wednesday, October 9 at 8/7 on The CW.《绿箭》第二季首播日期定于CW台10月9日周三东部时间8时，中部时间7时。
